name: This Game is For You 2022
description:
Hi there, welcome! This is a horror game I've made just for you :) This isn't the first game I've made for you - I've made three others I hope you've already checked out! This is the best one in my opinion. ;)

Most items' locations are randomised and there's a few different locations they can be, so look around.

___________________________________________________

Basic Controls:

-WASD keys = movement

-E = interact (you can search drawers btw)

-C = crouch

-Mouse = look around

-Hold down right-mouse button = equip crowbar (when you get it)

-Left-mouse button = use crowbar (when equipped)

__________________________________________________
